subject: Q4 Benefits Enrollment Open
body:
Dear Employee,

The Q4 benefits enrollment period is now open. Please review your options in the HR portal.

Best regards,
HR Team

subject: URGENT: Password Expires in 24 Hours
body:
Dear User,

Your password will expire in 24 hours. Click here to update: hxxp://company-login[.]secure-update[.]ru/reset

Failure to update will result in account lockout.

IT Support

subject: Weekly Industry Digest
body:
This week in cybersecurity:
- New ransomware variant discovered
- Zero-day in popular CMS
- Cloud security best practices

Read more at industry-news.com

subject: Invoice #INV-2024-0892 - Payment Required
body:
Please find attached invoice for services rendered.

Note: Our banking details have changed. New wire transfer information is in the attached PDF.

Payment due: NET 15

subject: Team Meeting Tomorrow
body:
Hi team,

Reminder about our all-hands meeting tomorrow at 2pm in the main conference room.

See you there!
- CEO

subject: Critical: Unusual Sign-in Activity Detected
body:
We detected unusual sign-in activity on your Microsoft 365 account.

Location: Moscow, Russia
Time: 2024-03-10 03:24:00 UTC

If this wasn't you, secure your account immediately: hxxps://microsoft-365-security[.]com/verify

FLAG{PH1SH1NG_D3T3CT3D_CHK_H34D3RS}

subject: Your Order Has Shipped
body:
Your order #123-4567890 has shipped and will arrive by March 15.

Track your package at amazon.com/orders

Thank you for shopping with us!
